description:
net: make TestDialTimeoutFDLeak a bit robust

TestDialTimeoutFDLeak will fail when system state somaxconn is
greater than expected fixed value.

Fixes issue 4384 (again).

messages.text:
Hello fullung@gmail.com, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hi Albert,

Would you mind having a look at this CL? Thanks.

On Thu, Dec 13, 2012 at 4:27 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3fe40a41018d ***

net: make TestDialTimeoutFDLeak a bit robust

TestDialTimeoutFDLeak will fail when system state somaxconn is
greater than expected fixed value.

Fixes issue 4384 (again).

R=fullung, dave, rsc
CC=golang-dev
